Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 1970...
Earned first career win on 4/22/1973...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1973, going 15-19, 3.69 ERA...
Won World Series with Chicago (N) in 1975...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1977, winning 2 games with a 0.50 ERA...
Was selected to the 1977 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1978, winning 2 games with a 1.26 ERA...

Pitched PERFECT GAME against Chicago (N) on 6/17/1981, striking out 12...
